alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 7:07PM MST until March 05 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE....Portions of northern Arizona including Flagstaff, Williams, Munds Park, Prescott, Grand Canyon, Seligman, Ash Fork, Keams Canyon, Kaibito. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Snow will also fall at times above 5000 to 6000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
